name: SUGA Game
description:
This is 'SUGA Game', a new video game from Outhouse Media. 'Suga' is Japanese for 'catch' and 'game' respectively, and 'Game' is a popular term amongst gamers and video game enthusiasts. 'Game' is a technical term meaning that it is more of a game than a game engine itself. 'SUGA Game' is a side-scrolling platformer with an in-depth level design influenced by classic platformers like Sonic the Hedgehog and Zelda.
The story of 'Game' is a tale of two brothers' journey to save the world from the cataclysmic events that have engulfed the planet at the turn of the century. Originally J.T. and Marcus are small amateur caricatures of the main characters from 'Suga', a game being developed by Outhouse Media and published by The Beggar Press. Marcus grew up in an orphanage and is now drinking and playing video games. J.T. is a fast and agile kid, and is described as a 'gar-tastic kid' by his mother. J.T. and Marcus come from a young age to be the duo that live the game they love, and the father of their two children. Game's world is one of technological marvels, with its ever expanding complexity and evolution. Outhouse Media's innovative engineering and creative direction has created a world that will no doubt appeal to players of all ages and skill levels.
